title: Frontend Engineer
companyDesc: A boutique product studio building consumer web apps with an emphasis on design and performance.
jobDescription: Design and implement responsive user interfaces, translate Figma into reusable React components, and collaborate with designers and backend engineers to ship polished features.
qualifications: 3+ years building web apps with React or similar frameworks
Strong CSS and responsive layout skills
Experience with component-driven development and testing

title: Crew Member
companyDesc: A global fast-food chain serving burgers, fries, and beverages.
jobDescription: Prepare and serve food, handle cash register, and maintain cleanliness in the restaurant.
qualifications: Ability to work in a fast-paced environment

title: Backend Software Engineer (Node.js)
companyDesc: Cloud-native infrastructure startup focusing on developer tooling and observability.
jobDescription: Build scalable microservices, optimize APIs for performance, and contribute to internal platform tools for deployment and monitoring.
qualifications: Knowledge of databases (Postgres, Redis) and message queues

title: Product Designer
companyDesc: A commerce startup making modular storefronts for niche brands.
jobDescription: Lead UX flows, craft high-fidelity mocks, run prototype tests with users, and work with engineers to ensure design fidelity.
qualifications: 3+ years in product or interaction design

title: Data Analyst
companyDesc: Analytics consultancy that helps SMBs make data-driven decisions.
jobDescription: Analyze customer and product datasets, create dashboards, and provide insights to inform marketing and product strategies.
qualifications: 2+ years with SQL and data visualization tools
Comfort with Excel/Google Sheets for analysis
Ability to translate data into clear recommendations

title: Barista
companyDesc: A coffeehouse chain specializing in handcrafted beverages and light snacks.
jobDescription: Prepare coffee and tea beverages, serve customers, and maintain a clean workspace.
qualifications: Able to stand for long periods

title: Busser
companyDesc: A casual dining restaurant offering American cuisine and drinks.
jobDescription: Clear and clean tables, assist servers, and maintain restaurant cleanliness.
qualifications: Ability to work in a team

title: Mobile Engineer (React Native)
companyDesc: Cross-platform mobile app maker focused on community-driven experiences.
jobDescription: Implement mobile features, optimize performance, and maintain shared code across iOS and Android using React Native.
qualifications: Understanding of native build tooling (Xcode/Android Studio)
Experience with state management and offline patterns
Comfort writing unit and integration tests

title: DevOps / Site Reliability Engineer
companyDesc: Managed cloud operations for high-availability web services.
jobDescription: Automate deployment pipelines, maintain monitoring/alerting, and lead incident response practices to keep services healthy.
qualifications: Experience with Kubernetes and cloud providers
Knowledge of Terraform or other IaC tools
Strong scripting skills (Python, Bash, or Go)

title: Server
companyDesc: A casual dining restaurant known for Italian cuisine and a welcoming atmosphere.
jobDescription: Take orders, serve food and beverages, and provide a positive dining experience.
qualifications: Ability to multitask in a busy environment

title: Cashier
companyDesc: A retail store offering a wide range of products including groceries, clothing, and electronics.
jobDescription: Operate the cash register, assist customers, and maintain a clean checkout area.

title: Marketing Manager
companyDesc: A platform for creators to build and sell portfolios and digital products.
jobDescription: Drive acquisition campaigns, own content strategy, measure channel ROI, and coordinate cross-functional launches.
qualifications: Experience with paid channels and analytics
Strong copywriting and campaign planning skills
Comfort working with small, fast-moving teams

title: Machine Learning Engineer
companyDesc: Applied AI company building ML features for enterprise SaaS.
jobDescription: Prototype and productionize ML models, collaborate with data engineering to build pipelines, and monitor model performance in production.
qualifications: Experience deploying models (Docker, TF Serving, TorchServe)
Solid understanding of feature engineering and evaluation

title: Customer Success Specialist
companyDesc: HR tooling startup that simplifies onboarding for remote teams.
jobDescription: Guide customers through onboarding, troubleshoot issues, and collect feedback to help shape product improvements.
qualifications: Ability to manage multiple accounts and prioritize tasks

title: QA Engineer
companyDesc: Enterprise software vendor delivering workflow automation tools.
jobDescription: Develop and maintain automated test suites, perform integration testing, and work with engineering to fix defects before release.
qualifications: Strong understanding of test case design
Familiarity with CI systems and bug tracking
Attention to detail and reliability mindset

title: Groundskeeper
companyDesc: Responsible for maintaining public parks, sports fields, and recreational areas.
jobDescription: Mow lawns, trim bushes, plant flowers, and maintain clean outdoor areas.
